subject: Attn,
body:
Attn,
I am in receipt of your mail,and I want to thank you very much for your concern towards assisting me to receive and secure this fund in your position.
The fund will be transferred to you via ATM CARD fully loaded with the total fund in it.
I will introduce you to the Foreign Remittance unit of the payment bank,where you will contact the person in charge of processing and loading of the ATM CARD, so that you will contact him urgently for him to commence action and activate the ATM to your favor.
My brother, I don't want anything that will make us delay this transfer request as this is exactly what you will be doing as soon as you open up communication with the contact person for the ATM CARD processing.
You will be briefing me of whatever that you are discussing with him to me always,so as to enable me keep my own record,do not forget it.
I demand that you forward the following information to me,so that it will be used to register your name and data in the database network of the payment bank as the beneficiary of the fund,so that the ATM CARD will be raised to your name.
Find below the information needed,
1)YOUR FULL NAME.
2) YOUR PRIVATE TELEPHONE NUMBER.
3) YOUR AGE.
4) YOUR SEX.
5)YOUR CONTACT ADDRESS.
i am waiting for your response and once i hear from you then i will send the contact information of the person who is in charge of the ATM CARD, so that you will contact him urgently for him to start work on the Card.I choose you because i feel that you are good and honest if i am not mistaken. I don't need a lawyer now as the Government is watching all my activities and they know my lawyer very well.
I await your response.
Fatima.

subject: Re:   Attn,
body:
Hello Fatima,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite interesting to hear about this ATM card and the process involved. I'm curious, how does the loading of such a large amount onto an ATM card work? 

Also, could you tell me more about the Foreign Remittance unit? What is their role in this process? And who is this contact person that will be handling the ATM card?

I'm sorry but I can't provide my personal details at this moment. However, I am very interested in learning more about this process.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Carol

subject: THANKS FOR YOUR REPLY, DO GET BACK TO ME
body:
Attn,Carol

How are you today? Thank you so much for your urgent response to my proposal. I really hope that this message will bring good health and success to your family.

Let me be straight to you on this ATM Card, The money in question is my inheritance money which was deposited by my late Father while in office.

When my father died,the corrupt Government officer has been tormenting me and my family,they have been monitoring all my activities to know if my late father has some fund deposited anywhere, They were accusing him of defrauding the country of some money, they wanted o confiscate the fund and have it diverted to thee private pocket.


This is the reason that i wanted you to be the beneficiary of the fund,So you will have to contact the payment Bank as the beneficiary of the fund,so that they will now have the fund processed and loaded in an ATM CARD and deliver it to you,so that you can start withdrawing it in any ATM MACHINE any where in the world.They will also tell you how much that you can be withdrawing in a day and also they will issue you the pin code that will enable you withdraw cash.


Coming to the question about the foreign remittance depart of the bank, they are the people in charge of raising and loading of the ATM card in your favor. i will forward the contact of information of the Person in charge to you in my next mail to you,so that you will contact them and open up communication with them.

Do not be afraid of anything as the person will advise and explain more to you, the fund will be loaded in the Card,with your information which makes you the beneficiary. that is why i requested all your information from you. Do not be Afraid as the card is the best option to get that amount to you without any questioning from any authority, remember that i am only presenting you being an outsider to be in charges because i don't want the corrupt Government officials of my country to know about this fund,because they will seize it and steal it.


This is the only opportunity for me and family to start a good life again,and i expect you to follow the steps as cautioned.

I will forward the contact of the person to you in my next mail,and i want you to cope rate with them and follow up with there directives, God bless you.




















Greetings,

I am making this contact to you in request for your urgent assistance
to help me to handle an investment in your country because of the current
situation in my country. I would appreciate your kind response if you are willing to help handle this project for me with your utmost honesty and trust.

I shall reward you handsomely and make it worth your while.
Send your response strictly to (thamos_bank2004@yahoo.co.uk)
Sincerely,

Farah Akilah Amani

DO GET BACK TO ME URGENT

subject: CONTACT THIS PERSON FOR THE ATM ISSUANCE TO YOU
body:

Dr.Umar Shuaib Ahmed

Fatima.

body:

Also, could you tell me a bit more about the current situation in your country that has led you to seek assistance?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

subject: Do this now,  CONTACT THIS PERSON FOR THE ATM ISSUANCE TO YOU
body:
Attn,Carol

Thanks for your mail, i have told you that the fund is under treat of being stolen by the corrupt Government officials here and i don't want to come out open to claim it as they will seize the opportunity to seize and steal the money from me.

I did not tell you that there is a bad situation in my country,what i have just said is exactly what will happen if they get to know that the money belongs to my late father.

Your part is to apply to the payment bank,and ask them to get this fund put in an ATM CARD and send to you,then you can now start withdrawing the fund and be putting it in your account and after which you will make provision for me and my family to fly over to your country,where we can now invest in any lucrative business together.

You don't have o worry for all is well and no risk involved.please contact the person in charge of the ATM CARD issuance at the foreign remittance dept of the payment bank.

body:

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm sorry to hear about the difficult situation you're facing. It's always tough when things are uncertain, isn't it?

Fatima, your plan sounds quite interesting. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further. How exactly does the ATM card process work? And how can I ensure that this process is safe and secure?

subject: Re: THANKS FOR YOUR REPLY, DO GET BACK TO ME
body:
Hello Farah Akilah ani,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm really sorry to hear about the situation you're currently facing in your country. It sounds like a very difficult and complex situation.

I'm intrigued by your proposal, but I must admit, I have a few questions that need clarification before we proceed further. You mentioned an ATM card loaded with funds from your late father's deposit. Could you please explain more about how this process works? 

Also, could you provide more details about the investment project you want me to handle? What kind of investment are we talking about here? And what would be my role in it?

Lastly, you mentioned that there is a person who will advise and explain more to me. Who is this person and what is their role in all of this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Carol

subject: THIS IS WHAT YOU SHOULD DO
body:

My dear, I have informed you that the money will be loaded in an Atm card which is attarched to the account where the money is deposited, what will be done is that the bank will effect the change of account to you as the beneficiary ,thereby they will attarched the ATM card to the account, after registering your information in there database base network as the beneficiary of the fund.
